response.overview: Leave your troubles out the doors! Life is hard? Forget them! There are no troubles here! Life is beautiful! 1930's Berlin, the days are dark but the nights are bright. A touching romantic connection is formed between Cliff, a young American author coming to the city looking for inspiration for his book, and Sally, a singer in the "Kit Kat Club", while the Nazis rise to power
response.title: Cabaret: Cameri
